function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Failure to update virtual representation based on changes in the physical system","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Smart buildings and robots must grasp spatial indoor topology, semantics, and dynamic information to serve people effectively","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to directly interact and view data in federated systems","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of high resolution risk mapping with cdrs","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of ai in predicting patient outcomes and disease diagnosis","category":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of different computing technologies in future cities","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Offering distant x-ray processing software for medical diagnosis","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"System failure leading to seeding events into the community","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ai implementation in LMIC","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rapid change in technology for ecosystem surveillance","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate simulation results leading to incorrect conclusions","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of blockchain technology for covid-19 apps","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Model validation under covid-19 interventions","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile applications for covid-19 impact management","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited impact of online medical services","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid growth of internet users in china","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited accessibility to the knowledge management platform may hinder the dissemination of critical information and best practices for malaria control.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mobile apps for tracking covid-19 issues and data integration challenges.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of equation-based models to simulate the epidemic dynamics","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporation of highly related review papers","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on telemedicine for diagnosis and treatment","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate randomisation in randomised studies leading to biased results.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing reliance on digital technology for essential services","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low score in dynamic envelope for case c","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inaccurate context parameters related to citizens’ distribution in the city","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise in the amount of health data generated by iot devices","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-based diagnosis for contagious diseases may lead to algorithmic biases and inaccurate identification","category":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying solely on wearable sensors and smart solutions for large-scale detection of cases may result in inaccurate or incomplete data.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of biosensor terminology among environmental audience","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Challenges in managing big data from wireless sensor networks, characterized by volume, velocity, and variety.","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of online surveys for data collection","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on existing ontologies and integration of terms from multiple sources may introduce inconsistencies and errors in the cido ontology.","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The adjustment coefficient c_ur for uv-c dose when the virus is suspended in air may be in a range 0.167-0.545.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent definitions and allocation of npis like work from home leading to identifiability problems","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges to validity in research studies","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited capability to continue operations online","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Existing systems that only follow simple measures such as physical distancing","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on semi-mechanistic approach with parameters estimated empirically and with strong prior distributions or fixed assumptions.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stratified random sampling approach may not fully represent the diversity of the population, leading to biased results.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased network security challenges with the expansion of 6g technology and connectivity scope","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of previous technical studies on confined households and dwellings","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rise in e-learning and use of iot in smart learning increases the risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on energy simulation software like energyplus for evaluating occupant distribution patterns and hvac system performance introduces the risk of inaccuracies in the simulation results, leading to suboptimal decisions for disease mitigation and energy efficiency.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of rt-qpcr assays for sars-cov-2 rna detection in water","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of real-time information","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Relying solely on web scraping for covid-19 data may evidence to assess the acceptability and feasibility of iaq interventions to key stakeholders.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"}]}
